entry.title: op_checktemplateverify and number of inputs
entry.summary: The issue at hand concerns the op_ctv Bitcoin script code and the requirement to specify a number of inputs. The poster is questioning the necessity of this requirement, and wonders why it is being enforced. Although they understand why one might want to specify a number of inputs, they do not see why it should be mandatory for users of the op. They suggest that if the op allowed both cases (specifying a number of inputs and allowing any number), it would provide the best of both worlds. To further discuss this topic, the poster has started a discussion on bitcointalk.org and provides a link to the forum. It is unclear what specific outcome they hope to achieve through this discussion.
